scripts.say: The aroma leads us here, uh... it seems we are not alone.
What a mess. Was there some sort of a celebration...
It's a festival! The Mid-Autumn Festival!
Huh? New guests? They must have been attracted by the smell of my osmanthus wine. Welcome~
Those wines... Are they the source of the aroma?
Yes. We only have that much left. They are too fragile though. Let's put down our hatred towards each other, at least just for today.
I don't drink, and there's nothing to be put down... But —— it smells really good~
It's not as red as blood! But it tastes good~~
Hey! Stop there! Wine thivees!
Wales~ Can I have a h-hug~
With a touch of alcohol, my sister becomes a troublemaker...
This is her charm point~ Come, let me hold you high.
I didn't except that so many people would come... all thanks to you.

I think it's because we all miss those we lost, friends, family... We cannot help ourselves thinking about them under such a beautiful moon, even if this isn't a festival for reunion... That's why we're all here together, right?
Are there other people staring at the same moon, and celebrating? Tonight, I believe there are.

Even though festivals are different from cultures, they are in common in many emotional ways. The meaning of the Mid-Autumn Festival is to miss our family and friends, and to celebrate our reunion. These are universal among all cultures. I wish there would be more people join us next year~~
Yes. My sisters and Helena's sisters... and all past friends, rivals, enemies... I wish everyone could be here.
Are all the wine gone... Oh, yes! There's a custom from my hometown... Cake Game. Let's have some fun!
Cake Game?
But I ate all the mooncakes... I, I mean we...
Let's roll dices, and the winner gets a mooncake~~
Huh... something like a roulette?

Yes, they are quite similar. Except the rewards are mooncakes... Did I hear the mooncakes are all gone? Let's use these lanterns then. Write down your wishes on them, then let fly... high to the rim of the world.
So that, all your friends, and even God will hear our wishes. Saratoga, are your drunken carriers still capable to fly?
Of course! They cannot wait!
Many thanks~ Those who know the rules, let's show the others how to play Cake Game~~
